'''1.21.2 Pre-Release 3''' (known as '''1.21.2-pre3''' in the [[launcher]]) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.2]], released on October 11, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-1-21-2-pre-release-3|title=Minecraft 1.21.2 Pre-Release 3|date=October 11, 2024|website=Minecraft.net}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''High Contrast resource pack'''
* Added textures for the following:
** Frame and background textures for tooltips.
** Slot background and highlight textures for the bundle tooltip (however, it's an empty transparent texture, and has no {{cd|[[mcmeta]]}} file next to it).

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Resource pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now <code>42</code>.
* Added <code>container/bundle/slot_background</code> texture for bundle slot background.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.21.2 Pre-Release 3
|;dev
|277316|Passengers dismount minecarts/boats when converting.
|277453|Projectiles visually fall when shot in a wall with high tick rate.
|;prev
|277488|Mobs in their death animations produce the fire extinguishing sound every tick while being in lava while it's raining.
|277491|Mobs in their death animations that are inside both water and lava produce the fire extinguishing sound every tick.
}}</onlyinclude>
